about_the_game:
The story begins in a remote and comfortable town.
The monster outside the town suddenly began to stir inexplicably.
Volcanic activity, mine collapse, giant dragons awakening, and undead spirits in graves stirring up.
What has happened to the world?
Are you content with the status quo or breaking through the shackles?
Is it salvation or sacrifice?
Everything is up to players to explore and decide.

Recruit teammates

This game has over twenty characters that can be recruited, each with a unique recruitment method.
Each character has completely different characteristics and skills.
There are some hidden powerful characters for players to explore.
Players need to decide how to reasonably match teams, overcome difficulties, and advance the plot.

Improvement of character abilities

Characters cannot be upgraded by fighting monsters, and unique methods are needed to enhance their abilities.

Free Exploration and Treasures

There are many things to explore freely in the game.
Some treasures require specific characters or methods to be obtained.

Planting and item synthesis

By planting seeds and beating monsters, materials can be obtained.
Upgrading the alchemy workshop can synthesize unique equipment and potions to enhance character strength.
The level of an alchemy workshop can be inherited in new game plus system.

Achievement system

Built in achievement system, containing over twenty achievements of varying difficulty levels.
Welcome players to challenge new achievement and receive additional rewards.

Multiple endings

Several completely different endings.
To achieve a perfect ending, it takes some time to explore.

New game plus system

Every time any ending is achieved, the new game plus system can be triggered.
Player could continually play the game with inheriting some game content.
The content that can be inherited in the new game plus system includes but is not limited to: achievements, coins, alchemist level, certain special equipment, and so on.
In new game plus system, different game processes and experiences will appear.

Endless challenges

In the underground arena and ancient abyss, there are powerful bosses and endless monsters waiting for you.
Go challenge and earn higher rewards.

Game duration

Generally, the game duration is approximately 10 to 20 hours.
If you want to achieve all achievements, the game duration may double.

Cloud storage

Cloud storage of save files is available.

Last

This is an independently developed game, I hope you enjoy it.

short_description: This role-playing game is based on the traditional RPG format. Players need to recruit companions on a land full of puzzles, explore the world, complete achievements, and ultimately usher in different endings. Players can learn the truth of the world through multiple rounds.
